title: Project Architecture
description: Learn about the conscious structure of this mod.

chapters.title: Foundation
chapters.content: The 'Foundation' folder (docs/foundation/) contains the immutable core principles and history. These files are APPEND-ONLY. They include: project_evolution.md (History), design_evolution.md (Decisions), and DEVELOPER_ONBOARDING.md (Workflow).

chapters.title: Workspace
chapters.content: The 'Workspace' (docs/) is where active development happens. It contains: task.md (Checklist), implementation_plan.md (Blueprint), and walkthrough.md (Proof).

chapters.title: Workflow Rules
chapters.content: 1. Safe Files: Never rewrite history. 2. Pre-Push: Always upgrade onboarding docs. 3. Conscious Coding: Plan before you code.
